Service Details: - Offers single family rental housing to the highest acceptable bidder and rented on a month by month or on a lease basis- Utilities are not included- Some pets may be permitted but must be approved prior to occupancy- Waiting list is not maintained, only short-listed applicants will be contacted
Eligibility: For full details, please visit City of Kelowna Rentals Properties webpage
How to Apply: Applications can be obtained when there is an active listing through the link or during normal business hours at City Hall. The City does not keep rental applications on file. All applications for property rentals are accepted for that property only.  When the listing has expired, the applications are destroyed.
Address & Map: Kelowna City Hall1435 Water StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1J4
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - accessible entrance to City Hall is located off Queensway
